name: Not Without My Gold!
description:
Description:

Be able to find all the gold you can before the time ends!

Key Points:

  • Jam theme (North/South/East/West) adapted to mechanics. 
  • Toon cardboard aesthetics.
  • Awesome original music.
  • Strong bug-free code.
  • Procedurally generated levels.
  • Funny to play some minutes.
  • Made by 1 developer in 3 days.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys or WASD    -    Move.
  • Space    -    Dig.
  • Left control    -    See Map.
  • Escape    -    Exit.

External Links:

  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/DiegoCTorguet
  • Bandcamp: https://senseitorguet.bandcamp.com/track/gold-not-without-my-gold-ost
  • Web: http://diegoctorguet.com/
